name: Nystatin
indications: nystatin oral suspension indicated treatment infections oral cavity caused candida albicans .
contraindications: infants : 2 ml ( 200,000 units ) four times daily ( 1 ml side mouth ) . pediatric patients adults : 4 6 ml ( 400,000 600,000 units ) four times daily ( one-half dose side mouth ) . note : limited neonates , including premature low-birth weight neonates , indicate 1 ml ( 100,000 units ) four times daily effective . local treatment continued least 48 hours perioral symptoms disappeared and/or cultures returned normal . recommended retained mouth long possible swallowing .
warningsAndPrecautions: nystatin oral suspension , usp bright yellow color suspension cherry flavor containing 100,000 units nystatin per ml , supplied follows : ndc 62135-813-46 – bottle 60 ml ndc 62135-813-47 – bottle 473 ml ndc 62135-813-05 – 5 ml unit dose cups ndc 62135-813-24 – 20 unit dose cups 5 ml store controlled room temperature 20°c 25°c ( 68°f -77°f ) . freeze manufactured : chartwell rx , llc . congers , ny 10920 l71884 rev . 10/2024
adverseReactions: nystatin contraindicated patients history hypersensitivity nystatin suspension components .
indications_original:
Nystatin oral suspension is indicated for the treatment of infections of the oral cavity caused by
 
  Candida albicans.
contraindications_original:
Infants: 2 mL (200,000 units) four times daily (1 mL in each side of mouth).
                  Pediatric patients and adults: 4 to 6 mL (400,000 to 600,000 units) four times daily (one-half of dose in each side of mouth).
                  NOTE: Limited clinical studies in neonates, including premature and low-birth weight neonates, indicate that 1 mL (100,000 units) four times daily is effective. 
                  Local treatment should be continued at least 48 hours after perioral symptoms have disappeared and/or cultures returned to normal. It is recommended that the drug be retained in the mouth as long as possible before swallowing.
warningsAndPrecautions_original:
Nystatin Oral Suspension, USP is a bright yellow color suspension with cherry flavor containing 100,000 units of nystatin per mL, supplied as follows:
                  NDC 62135-813-46 – bottle of 60 mL
                  NDC 62135-813-47 – bottle of 473 mL
                  NDC 62135-813-05 – 5 mL Unit Dose Cups
                  NDC 62135-813-24 – 20 Unit Dose Cups of 5 mL each
                  
                  Store at controlled room temperature between 20°C to 25°C (68°F -77°F).
                  
                     DO NOT FREEZE
                  
                  
                  
                     Manufactured for:
                       Chartwell RX, LLC. 
    Congers, NY 10920

 
                  
                  L71884
                  Rev. 10/2024
adverseReactions_original: Nystatin is contraindicated in patients with a history of hypersensitivity to nystatin or any of the suspension components.
